SELECT BASERESPONSIBILITY.RESPONSIBILITY_ID, BASERESPONSIBILITY.RESPONSIBILITY_NAME, BASERESPONSIBILITY.RESPONSIBILITY_CODE, BASERESPONSIBILITY.RESPONSIBILITY_DESC, TO_CHAR(BASERESPONSIBILITY.BEGIN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') BEGIN_DATE, TO_CHAR(BASERESPONSIBILITY.END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') END_DATE, BASERESPONSIBILITY.LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, BASERESPONSIBILITY.LAST_UPDATED_BY, TO_CHAR(BASERESPONSIBILITY.LAST_UPDATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') LAST_UPDATE_DATE, BASERESPONSIBILITY.CREATED_BY, TO_CHAR(BASERESPONSIBILITY.CREATION_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATION_DATE FROM AUPORTAL.BASE_RESPONSIBILITY_VL BASERESPONSIBILITY WHERE 1=1 AND BASERESPONSIBILITY.END_DATE>SYSDATE
AND BASERESPONSIBILITY.RESPONSIBILITY_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{responsibilityName} ||'%'
AND BASERESPONSIBILITY.RESPONSIBILITY_CODE LIKE '%'|| #{responsibilityCode} ||'%'
AND BASERESPONSIBILITY.RESPONSIBILITY_ID IN (SELECT B.RESPONSIBILITY_ID FROM AUPORTAL.BASE_PROFILE_VL A, AUPORTAL.BASE_PROFILE_VALUE B, (SELECT CAB.ORG_ID ORG_ID, CAB.USER_ID ORG_ID_CHILD, CAB.SECONDARY_INVENTORY_NAME ORG_NAME_CHILD, CAB.CUST_ACCOUNT_ID LEVEL_TYPE FROM CUX.CUX_CDM_ACCESS_BASEDATA CAB WHERE CAB.ACCESS_TYPE = '9' AND CAB.CUST_ACCOUNT_ID IN (2, 3)) ORG WHERE A.PROFILE_ID = B.PROFILE_ID AND A.PROFILE_CODE = 'ORG_ID' AND B.PROFILE_VALUE = ORG.ORG_ID_CHILD AND ORG.ORG_ID = #{orgId} )
AND TO_CHAR(BASERESPONSIBILITY.BEGIN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_CHAR(BASERESPONSIBILITY.END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY RESPONSIBILITY_NAME DESC

BASERESPONSIBILITY.LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, BASERESPONSIBILITY.LAST_UPDATED_BY, TO_CHAR(BASERESPONSIBILITY.LAST_UPDATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') LAST_UPDATE_DATE, BASERESPONSIBILITY.CREATED_BY, TO_CHAR(BASERESPONSIBILITY.CREATION_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATION_DATE, (SELECT ORG.ORG_ID FROM AUPORTAL.BASE_PROFILE_VL A, AUPORTAL.BASE_PROFILE_VALUE B, (SELECT CAB.ORG_ID ORG_ID, CAB.USER_ID ORG_ID_CHILD, CAB.SECONDARY_INVENTORY_NAME ORG_NAME_CHILD, CAB.CUST_ACCOUNT_ID LEVEL_TYPE FROM CUX.CUX_CDM_ACCESS_BASEDATA CAB WHERE CAB.ACCESS_TYPE = '9' AND CAB.CUST_ACCOUNT_ID='2') ORG WHERE A.PROFILE_ID = B.PROFILE_ID AND A.PROFILE_CODE = 'ORG_ID' AND B.PROFILE_VALUE = ORG.ORG_ID_CHILD AND B.RESPONSIBILITY_ID = BASERESPONSIBILITY.RESPONSIBILITY_ID )ORG_ID FROM AUPORTAL.BASE_RESPONSIBILITY_VL BASERESPONSIBILITY, BASE.BASE_RESPONSIBILITY_USER RU WHERE BASERESPONSIBILITY.RESPONSIBILITY_ID = RU.RESPONSIBILITY_ID AND RU.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY BASERESPONSIBILITY.RESPONSIBILITY_NAME ASC
